    • Method Detail

      • setGears

        public void setGears(int gear)
        This sets the gears to the input. If you input a gear that is greater or less than than the amount of gears we have than it will set it to the max gear or the lowest gear, respectively.
        Overrides:
        setGears in class DualMGShiftingDrivetrain
        Parameters:
        gear - the gear to change to
